concept.title: Time Spent
concept.shortdesc: Metrics that report on the amount of time visitors spend on a page, site, or per visit.

conbody.p: Version 14 calculates the average time spent on a page by placing each sequence of a specific variable value into one of ten ranges or buckets that represent average periods of time. For example, if a visitor spends 00:01:15 on a web page, the reported Time Spent on Page metric is 00:02:00. (The midpoint value of the 1 to 3 minute range).
Version 15 and ad hoc analysis use explicit values (including link events and video views) to calculate Time Spent, so the reported Time Spent on Page value in this example would be 00:01:15.

entry.p: Time stamp: Calculates a visitor's Time Spent value based on Web beacon time stamps generated by the visitor's page views.
Time stamp + link event: Calculates a visitor's Time Spent value based on Web beacon time stamps generated by the visitor's page views and link events (custom, download, exit, and video).
Ranged values: Reports Time Spent metrics using a midpoint value based on ten time buckets (or ranges), such as 30 to 60 seconds, 1 to 3 minutes, and 5 to 10 minutes.
Explicit values: Reports the explicit Time Spent value, eliminating the use of midpoint values and time buckets.
Midpoint average: Calculates average Time Spent metrics using the midpoint values rather than the explicit Time Spent values.
Explicit average: Calculates average Time Spent metrics using explicit Time Spent values rather than the midpoint Time Spent values.
Attribution: All time spent values are attributed on the day that the visit ends, even if some of the page views were on a previous day.
Attribution: All time spent values are attributed to the day on which each page view occurred.

conbody.note: Without non-page events like Video Views or Exit Links, time spent on the last page cannot be known.
conbody.p: The following Time Spent metrics are available:

entry.p: For a given dimension, Total Time Spent represents the total amount of time visitors interact with a specific value. Total Time Spent in the context of eVars take the total amount of time spent between each 'post' value, not the amount of time between each defined value.
The calculation for Total Time Spent includes the following:

ul.li: For Traffic dimensions, the instance of a given value as well as any subsequent link events where that value is not overwritten.
For Conversion dimensions, the defined value and persistence across all image requests within a visit before it is overwritten or expired.

entry.p: Calculated as: Total Time Spent divided by the total number of Visits, excluding single-hit visits.
Calculated as: Total Time Spent divided by the total number of Visitors, excluding visitors that have had only single-hit visits.

Represents the average time per sequence of a given value within a visit. A sequence is defined as a contiguous series of server calls within a visit where a given value does not change. Time spent in a sequence is inclusive of the following:

ul.li: The instance of a given Traffic or Conversion dimension.
The occurrence of link events that happen after the instance of a given Traffic or Conversion dimension value before that value is overwritten.
Persistence of a given Conversion dimension value within a visit before that value is overwritten.
